import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { SideBar } from '../app.interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-bar', templateUrl: './side-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-bar.component.css'] }) export class SideBarComponent { @Input() menu: SideBar[] = [] @Input() active = 'greeting' onClick(path: string) { this.active = path; } }
